title: Seoul City to Become Free Wi-Fi Zone by 2022
text:
Anybody will be able to use free Wi-Fi services anywhere in Seoul from 2022.

The Seoul Metropolitan Government on Monday said it will spend W102.7 billion over the next three years to build a citywide free Wi-Fi network (US$1=W1,198).

Currently, about 31 percent of the metropolitan area, including the city hall, public agencies, major parks, plazas and marketplaces, provide free Wi-Fi.

"The aim is to make sure that every citizen benefits from internet access in the digital age," a city official said. "Foreign visitors will also be able to use free Wi-Fi services as they please."

The metropolitan government plans to build its own Wi-Fi network instead of using private mobile networks. It believes this will cost a lot initially but pass the break-even point in five years considering the high fees of private telecoms.
description: Seoul City to Become Free Wi-Fi Zone by 2022
